page.title: 11ST.FRANCIS,POSBURY
page.content: We went through the gate and went down a steep driveway to the convent, it is really like a large house. We went in and looked at some slides with most of the things on it that the nuns did.Like doing bees honey and gardening,and it also showed most of the flowers they had. We went out into the garden it was 3 acres altogether. it had about 4 ponds with water forgetmenots. A little further on was the vegetable patch in it was lettuce, carrots, cabbages, peas, broad beans.The nuns do all their own farming they even have their own tractor to use.They use every piece of land for growing crops and vegetables, keeping chickens,bees and usually pigs and sometimes cows. Pheasants come and steal some of their crops! We then went inside to meet all the sisters.There are six of them.
